issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68200995-a3047b00-ffc9-11e9-9999-cdcf35a0f750.png)

comment.body:
It is blockied by Easylist China, not sure why.
But you can add an exclusion rule to the user rules list:
`ipv6.baidu.com,www.baidu.com,www1.baidu.com,xueshu.baidu.com#@##con-ar > .result-op[mu*="nourl.ubs.baidu.com"]`

issue.title: bgm.tv
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://bgm.tv/subject/301369](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbgm.tv%2Fsubject%2F301369) ### Comment Username: @xmydl520 > こんにちは。こちらにひとつややこしい問題があります。カスタムルール(ユーザーフィルター)がONであろうかOFFであろうか関係せずブロックが機能しません。全部が全部のサイトにて、すべてのユーザーフィルターが機能しません。色々調べたが解決策が見つかりません。ルーターにAdguard Homeが併用しています。今のうちに唯一の打開策はAdguard Blocker(Adguard Assistantではなく)を同時に稼働すること。こちらのユーザーフィルターに同じルールをインポートしたら問題なく機能します。ちなみにChromeで同じサイトを訪ねたらそちらは問題なく(Adguard Blockerがなくても)ブロックされました。ご迷惑をかけてすみません。 > Hello. There is a complication here. Block does not work regardless of whether the custom rule (user filter) is on or off. It does not work on all sites with any user rule. I also have Adguard Home on my router. The only way to solve it at the moment is to run Adguard Blocker (not Adguard Assistant) at the same time. With importing the same rules into the user filter it works fine. By the way, I visited the same site on Chrome and was blocked without any problem (even without Adguard Blocker). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ST8B9Gz.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/mn7RlFx.png)

pull_request.title: www.eternalcollegest.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address https://www.eternalcollegest.com/entry/daigaku-debut ### Add your comment and screenshots
screenshot 1 ![](https://i.postimg.cc/fbJpVg7g/image.png)
screenshot 2 ![](https://i.postimg.cc/ZR6f3kWj/image.png)

### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: ok.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
Hello,

To be honest, I don't know what exactly do you mean by "the hash calculation" and how to check it, but I have removed problematic rule which caused issue with audio player.
Filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение 30-60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

issue.title: mesg.benl.ebay.be
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://mesg.benl.ebay.be](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmesg.benl.ebay.be) ### Comment > The public AdGuard DNS server(s) 94.140.14.14 and 94.140.15.15 have trouble resolving the domain "mesg.benl.ebay.be" from time to time, especially in the last few days. This is used for messaging on the Belgium Ebay site, and should not be blocked or remain unresolved in DNS. In the screenshot you can see that DNS resolving works OK one second, but the next second it doesn't anymore without any changes to the system. When I test DNS resolution on Quad9's (9.9.9.9) DNS server it works there while at the same time it doesn't work on AdGuard Public DNS. I have also seen this behaviour on other subdomains from domain "ebay.be" and even on the main site as well. > This is not related to any browser or other software as the DNS requests are directly done from the client to AdGaurd's DNS servers. There is no DNS blocking or blocking software in place. > Could you investigate why this is the case, as it does not look like expected behaviour? > > Thank you ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/KLknBrQ.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/0XDkOhe.png)

issue.title: ok.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
@hc103113 Hi. Cannot reproduce.
For example, this video works fine with your settings:
https://www.nba.com/watch/video/danny-green-rejects-trae-young?plsrc=nba&game-highlights=0022100082

Is this issue related to the Stealth Mode or to the filters?

pull_request.title: Fix reveddit.com's error message popup
pull_request.body:
reveddit.com shows an error message with a helpful description on
how to fix it when it's unable to connect to reddit.

This change unblocks those popup messages by excluding popups 
that contain "Error".

<details>
<summary>Screenshot:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70697865/174856811-1a0586a6-908a-43d4-a2b1-b4447a35386b.png)

</details>

issue.title: mesg.benl.ebay.be
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://mesg.benl.ebay.be](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmesg.benl.ebay.be) ### Comment > The public AdGuard DNS server(s) 94.140.14.14 and 94.140.15.15 have trouble resolving the domain "mesg.benl.ebay.be" from time to time, especially in the last few days. This is used for messaging on the Belgium Ebay site, and should not be blocked or remain unresolved in DNS. In the screenshot you can see that DNS resolving works OK one second, but the next second it doesn't anymore without any changes to the system. When I test DNS resolution on Quad9's (9.9.9.9) DNS server it works there while at the same time it doesn't work on AdGuard Public DNS. I have also seen this behaviour on other subdomains from domain "ebay.be" and even on the main site as well. > This is not related to any browser or other software as the DNS requests are directly done from the client to AdGaurd's DNS servers. There is no DNS blocking or blocking software in place. > Could you investigate why this is the case, as it does not look like expected behaviour? > > Thank you ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/KLknBrQ.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/0XDkOhe.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Public Adguard DNS Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

pull_request.title: Fix reveddit.com's error message popup
pull_request.body:
reveddit.com shows an error message with a helpful description on
how to fix it when it's unable to connect to reddit.

This change unblocks those popup messages by excluding popups 
that contain "Error".

<details>
<summary>Screenshot:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70697865/174856811-1a0586a6-908a-43d4-a2b1-b4447a35386b.png)

</details>

comment.body:
Same, also with AdGuard DNS.

Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window 30-60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.
